name: Agile Engineering
description:
Malfunctioning robots are on the loose. As the ship engineer, its up to you to fix them before you or anyone else gets hurt. But no one said you couldn't groove out while doing so!

WASD to move, Space when pointing at a bot to fix
PLAY WITH SOUND ON!

This game was made as a part of the 2020 Mix and Game Jam. In line with the theme of mixing genres, this game combines Rhythm and Bullet Hell games together.
Team Members:
Nick Browning - Coding, UI art
High Score: 68, 600
Dominic Vasi - Character and Background Art, Animations
High Score: 63, 000

Any feedback in the comments is greatly appreciated!
